hero.greeting: Hi, I'm Luis Fernando Benavides Rengifo
hero.title: Senior Software Architect
hero.subtitle: Developing high-impact solutions for leading companies like Mercado Libre, Rappi, Nequi, and Protección. Specialized in microservices architecture, fintech, and digital transformation with proven results: 90% error reduction, 90% performance improvement in transactions.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Experience and professional background
about.intro:
Master in Software Engineering (PUJ Cali, distinguished scholarship recipient from Valle del Cauca Government) with 22+ years developing high-impact solutions for leading Latin American tech companies: Mercado Libre, Rappi, Nequi, and Protección. PMI, Scrum Master, CAPM, and ITIL V3 certified.

Specialized in microservices architecture, fintech, e-commerce, and digital transformation. Self-taught professional committed to technical excellence and continuous improvement.

expertise.title: Areas of Expertise
expertise.item1: Microservices Architecture - Mercado Libre, Rappi, Nequi (90% error reduction)
expertise.item2: Cloud & DevOps (AWS) - Lambda, EKS, Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD
expertise.item3: Backend Development - Java/Kotlin, Spring Boot, Kafka, Redis, PostgreSQL
expertise.item4: Technical Leadership - Fintech & e-commerce teams, Scrum Master certified
expertise.item5: Digital Transformation - 90% performance improvement, 80% cost reduction
expertise.item6: Observability & Monitoring - Grafana, Splunk, New Relic, Kibana

techStack.title: Tech Stack
techStack.subtitle: Technologies and tools I work with

services.title: Services
services.subtitle: Specialized solutions based on proven experience

development.title: Backend Development & Microservices Architecture
development.description: Specialized backend development with Java/Kotlin and Spring Boot. Design and implementation of microservices architectures for fintech, e-commerce, and digital banking. Proven experience at Mercado Libre, Rappi, and Nequi.
features: Backend with Java/Kotlin and Spring Boot
Patterns: Circuit Breaker, Saga, Event Sourcing

architecture.title: Cloud Architecture & DevOps
architecture.description: Cloud architecture on AWS and DevOps practices implementation. Migration from on-premise to cloud, containerization with Docker/Kubernetes, and CI/CD. Achievements: 90% performance improvement, deployment time reduced from 20 to 2 minutes.
features: AWS: Lambda, EKS, S3, CloudWatch, SNS

consulting.title: Technical Leadership & Digital Transformation
consulting.description: Technical team leadership in critical projects and digital transformation. Agile methodologies implementation, process optimization, and technical mentoring. Results: 80% cost reduction, 50% improvement in learning curve.

lowcode.title: Feasibility Study for Low-Code Platform Implementation
lowcode.description: Graduate project for Master's degree in Software Engineering. Feasibility study for low-code platform at Pontificia Universidad Javeriana, Cali.

freedcamp.title: Web Project with Spring Boot - Freedcamp REST API
freedcamp.description: Technical test to validate programming skills. Integration with Freedcamp REST API.

apirest.title: REST API Project Implementation with Spring Boot
apirest.description: Technical test to validate programming skills. REST API development with Spring Boot.

bootstrap.title: Web Project with Spring Boot and Bootstrap
bootstrap.description: Technical test for Full Stack Developer. Web development with Spring Boot and Bootstrap.

lambda.title: REST API Services using AWS Lambda
lambda.description: Final project for Advanced Software Engineering Topics. Three REST API services with AWS Lambda.

sms.title: SMS Messaging Implementation
sms.description: Allows sending SMS messages to affiliates and employers of a health promoting entity.

ci.title: Continuous Integration Implementation - WebStore Project
ci.description: Final project for Software Construction and Testing. Continuous integration, automated testing and static analysis.

patrones.title: Design Patterns Implementation
patrones.description: Final project for Software Design Strategies and Patterns. Implementation of design patterns.

bolsa.title: Job Board Integration with PeopleSoft
bolsa.description: Allows creating institutional users to the external employment platform.

salesforce.title: Salesforce CRM Integration with PeopleSoft
salesforce.description: Allows tracking admission candidates from opportunity creation to payment and enrollment.

mega.title: Authorization and Care Management Improvement (MEGA)
mega.description: Ensures health benefits management (POS, NO POS, PAC and Subsidized POS), optimizing care process.

fosyga.title: Software for Law Resolution 458 of 2013 Compliance (Fosyga)
fosyga.description: Complies with Law Resolution 458 of 2013, which unifies the reimbursement procedure before the Solidarity and Guarantee Fund.

arco.title: Production Order Control Software (ARCO)
arco.description: Allows tracking orders during the production process.

tarjeta.title: Credit Card Control and Administration Software
tarjeta.description: Allows keeping a record of company credit card customers from application to delivery.

softcontrol.title: SOFTCONTROL Application - Disciplinary Process Management
softcontrol.description: Creation of query, statistics, control and tracking, reports, management user and complaint reception modules.

inventarios.title: Inventory Control Software
inventarios.description: Allows capturing data from the billing process and generating various reports from this information.
